Version 0.2.2 (2026-01-20)
==========================

This is a bugfix release:

* documentation based on pydata theme by `Bryan Lawrence <https://github.com/bnlawrence>`_ in https://github.com/NCAS-CMS/cfs3/pull/13
* TLC towards bugfix release v0.2.2 (including package-level versioning, clean-up of environment files) by `Valeriu Predoi <https://github.com/valeriupredoi>`_ in https://github.com/NCAS-CMS/cfs3/pull/18
* correct handling of ``cmd2>=3.0`` new API by `Bryan Lawrence <https://github.com/bnlawrence>`_ in ``main``
